meanings.definition: Relating to or situated on the opposite side of the earth.
meanings.sent1: The antipodean city was experiencing daylight when ours was in darkness.
meanings.sent2: She dreamt of visiting antipodean lands where the sun rose in the west.
meanings.sent3: The antipodean penguins decided to throw a party at the South Pole.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like an antipodean magnet, always pulling them together.
meanings.sent5: The concept of antipodean locations fascinated the young explorer.

meanings.definition: A person from Australia or New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The antipodean brought delicious Vegemite sandwiches to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: She met an antipodean traveler who shared stories of the Outback.
meanings.sent3: The antipodean won the rugby match with a spectacular try.
meanings.sent4: His accent was an antipodean melody in the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The group was excited to welcome the antipodean exchange student.
